scripts.asbuild:gui_untouched: asc node_modules/as2d/assembly/glue.ts assembly/gui.ts -b build/gui_untouched.wasm -t build/gui_untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug --use Math=JSMath
scripts.asbuild:gui_optimized: asc node_modules/as2d/assembly/glue.ts assembly/gui.ts -b build/gui_optimized.wasm -t build/gui_optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate -O3 --use Math=JSMath
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:engine_untouched && npm run asbuild:engine_optimized && npm run asbuild:gui_untouched && npm run asbuild:gui_optimized
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run asbuild && npm run pagebuild

scripts.dev: npm run asbuild && npx parcel serve -d build index.html
